Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the Registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#168; Written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#168; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#168; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#168; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On January&nbsp;26, 2016, Apple&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Apple&#148;) issued a press release regarding Apple&#146;s financial results for its first fiscal quarter ended December&nbsp;26, 2015, a related data sheet and supplemental materials. A copy of Apple&#146;s press release is attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;99.1, a copy of the related data sheet is attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;99.2 and a copy of the supplemental materials is attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;99.3. The information contained in this Current Report shall not be deemed &#147;filed&#148; for purposes of Section&nbsp;18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing. &nbsp; Item&nbsp;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &nbsp; (d) Exhibits. &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 99.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Press release issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016. 99.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Data sheet issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016. 99.3 &nbsp;&nbsp; Supplement materials issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016. SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; Date: January&nbsp;26, 2016 &nbsp; &nbsp; Apple Inc. &nbsp; &nbsp; By: &nbsp; /s/ Luca Maestri &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Luca Maestri &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Senior Vice President, &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Chief Financial Officer Exhibit Index &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp;&nbsp; Exhibit Description 99.1 &nbsp;&nbsp; Press release issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016. 99.2 &nbsp;&nbsp; Data sheet issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016. 99.3 &nbsp;&nbsp; Supplemental materials issued by Apple Inc. on January 26, 2016.
